definition: to see/to meet/to appear (to be sth)/to interview

sentences.english: Direct fetal injury is an infrequent complication of blunt trauma.
sentences.chinese: 胎儿直接损伤是钝器伤的罕见并发症。

sentences.english: Invasive molar pregnancy is extremely rare, but is one of te pre-cancer stage for choriocarcinoma .
sentences.chinese: 侵袭性葡萄胎非常罕见，但却是绒癌的一种癌前病变。

sentences.english: In fact, Yang Chengxing's case is by no means a rare one.
sentences.chinese: 事实上，毫无疑问，杨诚星的例子是很罕见的。

sentences.english: Leiomyosarcoma of the small intestine is an uncommon tumor.
sentences.chinese: 小肠平滑肌肉瘤是一种罕见的肿瘤。

sentences.english: Conclusions Synovial sarcoma of the hypopharynx is a malignant soft-tissue tumor that is seen rarely in the head and neck.
sentences.chinese: 结论喉咽部滑膜肉瘤是头颈部罕见的软组织恶性肿瘤。

sentences.english: For handed down your porcelain rare high-quality goods.
sentences.chinese: 为传世汝瓷罕见之精品。

sentences.english: And yet pure iron is scarcer than gold or diamonds.
sentences.chinese: 然而纯铁比黄金或金刚石还罕见。

sentences.english: These effects of excess androgens are called virilization and occur rarely.
sentences.chinese: 这些过多雄激素的影响即罕见的女性男性化。

sentences.english: Postoperative septic arthritis is an uncommon complication after anterior cruciate ligament reconstruction.
sentences.chinese: 前叉重建后感染性关节炎是一种罕见的并发症。

sentences.english: Why did Japanese public opinion support his visit to Japan?
sentences.chinese: 为何日本舆论罕见地一致支持李前总统访日等等。

sentences.english: Deaths are rare, fewer than thirteen thousand a year.
sentences.chinese: 死亡是罕见的，不到十三万一年。

sentences.english: The mystery is that crises erupt so rarely.
sentences.chinese: 但神秘之处在于，危机的爆发如此罕见。

sentences.english: A rare example of a Feeorin, Nym was orphaned at an early age.
sentences.chinese: 作为罕见的菲奥林人，尼姆很早就成了孤儿。

sentences.english: There was a rare whole eclipse of the sun had happened along the Yantze Rive, China this morning.
sentences.chinese: 今天上午在中国长江沿线发生了一次罕见的日全蚀。

sentences.english: We report on an unusual case of penetrating tracheal injury caused by a needlefish.
sentences.chinese: 我们报告一个被针鱼刺伤穿通气管的罕见个案。

sentences.english: Therarity bias is also sometimes called a" nonconformist bias".
sentences.chinese: 罕见稀有偏好有时也被称为“非从众偏好”。

definition: rare/not familiar (to the speaker)/sth rarely experience/hard to see
one and only (idiom); rarely seen/unique of its kind
can be rated as/can be said to be
lit. as rare as phoenix feathers and unicorn horns (idiom)/fig. few and far between
